title: RPG Adventure Chiptune Collection
description: 60+ Minutes of Adventurous Chiptune Music for Games!
longDescription:
PREVIEW: https://youtu.be/ArC0zDrpE4w

TRACKLIST: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1gqzZ6hV93Jb8rDlWN7JtZaJ9blwOzyY6/view?usp=drive_link


The RPG Adventure Chiptune Collection includes 60 minutes of retro-inspired songs, borne out of a love and nostalgia for early handheld RPGs! Every track was made exclusively in FamiTracker with the VRC6 expansion chip for a truly authentic 8-bit sound. 


This collection contains a variety of styles in order to perfectly match the many areas in which players find themselves, whether navigating a mountainside, sailing the surf, investigating an icy palace, battling brutes, or having fun at a festival. Keep the music in the background and subtly compliment your game’s environment using the included LITE tracks with reduced instrumentation, or fill the scene with the full arrangements for more significant moments. 


INCLUDES:

Main Tracks

  • 29 Full Instrumentation Loops + 12 Intros

LITE Tracks

  • 23 Reduced Instrumentation Loops + 10 Intros

Stingers

  • 3 Short Non-Loopable Stingers

**See above for the full Tracklist


Thanks for being here!

_______________________________________________________________________________________________________


The art featured on the box in the gallery image is by luizishan. This piece and more work by them can be found at https://www.freepik.com/free-photo/two-travelers-discovered-ruins-ancient-city-dense-forest-3d-illustration_15174550.htm#from_view=detail_alsolike
technicalDetails:
Tracks with LOOP Tag: Loopable

Tracks with INTRO Tag: Designed to play once before LOOP
